  • Classes in domain.model.exceptions used by domain.controller 
    Class and Description
    FinishGameException
    Treats Finish Game exception Happens when the user quits a non-finished game.
    UserAlreadyExistsException
    Treats User Already Exists exception Happens when creating a User that already exists in the system.
    UserNotFoundException
    Treats User Not Found exception Happens when querying a User that doesn't exist in the system.
  • Classes in domain.model.exceptions used by domain.controller.data 
    Class and Description

    Treats User Not Found exception Happens when querying a User that doesn't exist in the system.
  • Classes in domain.model.exceptions used by domain.model 
    Class and Description
    CommandInterruptException
    Treats Command Interruption Happens when the system is expecting some input from the user and receives an in-game command instead.
    EqualRolesException
    Treats Equal Roles exception Interruption Happens when the system detects a new game is being created with two users of the same role.
    FinishGameException
    Treats Finish Game exception Happens when the user quits a non-finished game.
